From childhood, I showed power and superiority of will and loved power
From childhood, I acted decisively, did whatever I wanted and said 'no' clearly
From adolescence, I had the inherent qualities of a leader and always became the leader and head of the group in pursuit of power
I have the ability to impose my will and desire on others
In any gathering I'm in, without effort from me, I am chosen as leader by them, especially during major decisions or problems and crises
The most important part of my life is work, and in work, my goal is to achieve power, wealth and expand territory
In life I am very serious, strict, persistent and confident, and I generally succeed in my work and achieve everything I wanted
I have the ability to work for long periods without feeling tired and can continue working until the end of my life without retirement
People are not comfortable approaching me (because of my powerful presence)
I generally think logically and my behaviors and decisions are based on logic and are not affected by my emotions
I have decision-making power and high speed in decision-making
I generally exercise power from a distance and don't get involved in details
With my growth and progress, people under my rule also grow and progress
People under my rule are usually secure and generally have no insecurity or anxiety
People not aligned with me and my rule are automatically removed from my group, and firing people who are not efficient is easy for me
I know how to guide people to achieve the desired result, so it's in others' interest to listen to me
I don't feel sorry for weak and incapable people, because incapability and weakness are harmful and hinder their progress
I married consciously to stabilize or expand my social position
I want to marry someone whose will is easy for me to control and I can have them under my control
Sexual relationships give me a sense of power
I provide all facilities for my children on condition that they pay attention to my words and live completely under my command
I don't have emotional expression with my children
My inner belief is: 'I make the final decision'
My most prominent feature is leadership and my influence comes through this
My inner satisfaction comes when I'm at the peak of work and financial success and have control of work and life of myself and those important to me
